meanings.definition: Hair grown on the sides of the face in front of the ears.
meanings.sent1: His sideburn was long and curly.
meanings.sent2: She brushed her sideburn behind her ear.
meanings.sent3: The sideburn looked like a little bush on his face.
meanings.sent4: Her sideburn was a dark frame around her face.
meanings.sent5: The sideburn swayed gently in the breeze.

meanings.definition: To grow hair on the sides of the face in front of the ears.
meanings.sent1: He decided to sideburn his hair for a new look.
meanings.sent2: She carefully sideburned her hair to match the style.
meanings.sent3: The barber joked that he could sideburn a masterpiece on his head.
meanings.sent4: Her hair seemed to sideburn like a garden growing on her face.
meanings.sent5: The hairdresser skillfully sideburned his hair into a trendy style.
